actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to exclude certain social security payments in determining annual income for purposes of paying non-service-connected disability pension to veterans.

summary.text: Excludes certain social security payments in determining annual income for purposes of paying non-service-connected disability pensions to veterans. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to exclude certain social security payments in determining annual income for purposes of paying non-service-connected disability pension to veterans.
